channel.title: Performance on Nithya Shikarpur
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Nithya Shikarpur

item.title: Music Performance in Montreal
item.description: Videos from my performance at Nexgen Multiarts festival organized by Kabir Centre For Arts & Culture, Montreal, Canada on 21 Oct 2023.

item.title: Music Performance in MA, USA
item.description: Videos from my performance at a house concert in Framingham, MA on 17th December, 2022.

item.title: Music Program at IME, 17th December 2022
item.description: Videos from my performance at Indian Music Experience, Bangalore on 17th December, 2022.

item.title: Geidi Prima
item.description: I gave vocals for the song Geidi Prima on Trey Kams' album Supermassive!

item.title: Nari (Woman) - a collaboration with Ronita Mookerji
item.description: This was a collaboration I did with Ronita Mookerji, a Bangalore based danseuse.

item.title: Kajri - Kehenawa Mano O Radha Rani
item.description: This is a presentation of a kajri (semi-classical song). The lyrics are:

item.title: Ullavarushivalaya - Song for shivaratri
item.description: This is a song by the poet Basavanna in praise of Lord Shiva.

item.title: Mist Of Capricorn (Cover)
item.description: This is a cover of the song “Mist of Capricorn” originally performed by the band Agam.

item.title: Bharathanatyam Dance Performance
item.description: I am a student of Bharathanatyam (Indian classical dance form) under the guidance of Guru P.
